Hi Cary, Rich of the Master Po, Trickie und all,
The pic is of very poor quality.................  trickie und I were reading 
something something Kanetsuna saku.
Cutting edge is 24 inches, NOT in gunto mount. I am thinking it could be 
Meiji period.

Will submit  a " better " oshigata once I have the sword in hand.
Just hoping there's no stamp of any sort.

Milt
